description: This file defines an internal utility object 'ChessGameRestorer' used to reconstruct instances of 'ChessGame' with specific game states, including position, side to move, and captured pieces, for a chess game application.

classes.name: ChessGameRestorer
classes.description: Internal singleton object providing methods to restore a chess game's state from given parameters.

methods.name: restore
methods.description: Creates a ChessGame instance with specified mode, position, side to move, and optionally captured pieces for white and black sides.
